body: These are the initial spack build package changes for the Krell Insitute and Argo Navis Technologies, LLC related products.   This pull request adds these new packages: xerces-c, cbtf, cbtf-krell, cbtf-argonavis, cbtf-lanl, and openspeedshop.   It alters several others with patches or options that are needed to support the Krell related projects.
title: Add support for Krell Institute related products.
